SELECT NormalSeq.nextval AS "saleNo" FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO Normal (saleNo, saleType, title, saleState, info, price, count, state, pNo, userNo, regidDate) VALUES (#{saleNo}, #{saleType}, #{title}, #{saleState}, #{info}, #{price}, #{count}, #{state}, #{product.pNo}, #{user.userNo}, #{regidDate})
mapper.select: SELECT saleNo, saleType, title, saleState, info, price, count, state, pNo as "product.pNo", Normal.userNo as "user.userNo", regidDate, id as "user.id" FROM Normal, UserTable WHERE saleNo = #{saleNo} AND Normal.userNo = UserTable.userNo
SELECT saleNo, title, Usertable.name as "user.name", regidDate From Normal, UserTable WHERE Normal.userNo = UserTable.userNo AND saleState = 'OPEN'
SELECT saleNo, title, UserTable.name as "user.name", regidDate From Normal, UserTable WHERE Normal.userNo = UserTable.userNo AND Normal.userNo=#{userNo}
SELECT saleNo, title, userNo From Normal WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'

SELECT saleNo, title, Usertable.name as "user.name", regidDate From Normal, UserTable, Product WHERE Normal.userNo = UserTable.userNo AND saleState = 'OPEN' AND normal.pNo = product.pNo and product.cateNo = #{cateNo}
